title: How to Make Buttery Apple Slices

steps.headline: Slice the apples into large, thick slices.
Squeeze the citrus juice over the slices.
In a medium bowl, beat the butter or margarine until soft.
steps.description: Mix in cinnamon and garam masala.

steps.headline: Spread the butter or margarine mix on each side of the slices.
Cook over a hot barbecue or grill for 1–2 minutes.
steps.description: The apple slices are ready when the apple softens and the butter melts.

steps.headline: Serve warm.
steps.description: Ice cream goes well with this dish.

text: Slice the apples into large, thick slices.  Squeeze the citrus juice over the slices.  In a medium bowl, beat the butter or margarine until soft. Mix in cinnamon and garam masala. Spread the butter or margarine mix on each side of the slices.  Cook over a hot barbecue or grill for 1–2 minutes. The apple slices are ready when the apple softens and the butter melts. Serve warm. Ice cream goes well with this dish.
